text: Mahbubey Alam (17 February 1949 â€“ 27 September 2020) was a Bangladeshi politician and lawyer. He was the Attorney General of Bangladesh from 2009 until his death in 2020. He was a senior advocate at the Supreme Court of Bangladesh. He was born in Munshiganj District, present-day Bangladesh. Alam was hospitalized at a Dhaka hospital on 4 September 2020 with COVID-19. He died four weeks later on 27 September from the infection, aged 71. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Bangladesh Category:Politicians from Dhaka Division Category:Bangladeshi lawyers
title: Mahbubey Alam
